resources.string: I perceive my self as a confident and hardworking individual. I carry out any task assigned to me without hesitation, provided the instructions are clear. I am impatent which is the reason why i am quick learner. On the other hand, I am creative person and I love to test my boundaries. In order to do so, I keep pushing myself to think out of the box.I perceive my self as a confident and hardworking individual. I carry out any task assigned to me without hesitation, provided the instructions are clear. I am impatent which is the reason why i am quick learner. On the other hand, I am creative person and I love to test my boundaries. In order to do so, I keep pushing myself to think out of the box
